CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironpeak Residences relative to Willow Creek Estates?
SRP.A: Ironpeak Residences is {above} Willow Creek Estates in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Willow Creek Estates relative to Ironpeak Residences?
SRP.A: Willow Creek Estates is {below} Ironpeak Residences in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironpeak Residences}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Willow Creek Estates}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironpeak Residences's maximum Rental Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironpeak Residences's maximum Rental Yield is in {1993}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Willow Creek Estates's minimum Rental Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Willow Creek Estates's minimum Rental Yield is in {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1987, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1980 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1982 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1988, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1984 and 1988 was {smaller} than between 1985 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1977, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1977 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1976 and 1977 was {lower} than between 1977 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1988, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1979 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1977 and 1988 was {lower} than between 1979 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironpeak Residences} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironpeak Residences and Willow Creek Estates first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironpeak Residences and Willow Creek Estates did not exchange leading positions.
